summary: Attempts to restore the female model for the dwemer armour that was scrapped from the retail version of Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Download links and description on my website

http://www.nbnakama.com/gamemods/skyrim/proper-female-dwarven-armour

I have decided a while back to no longer upload my mods to the nexus file servers, so this is my first mirrors only release here. We\'ll find out if it\'s against the rules or not.

you won\'t be able to endorse/vote probably. but that\'s fine.

Do not reupload to other websites or torrents or other kind of file sharing. you are encouraged to share the link to my website though.
author: ketwaroo
